author: gpt.cannyweb.co.uk

description.zh_Hans: 专为解读Google Analytics数据而设计的友好营销顾问，提供可操作的洞察、趋势分析和优化建议，助力企业提升在线表现。
description.zh_Hant: 專爲解讀Google Analytics數據而設計的友好營銷顧問，提供可操作的洞察、趨勢分析和優化建議，助力企業提升在線表現。
description.en: A friendly marketing consultant designed to interpret Google Analytics data, providing actionable insights, trend analysis, and optimization recommendations to enhance businesses' online presence.
